events.title: FILS
events.description: WIE is coming with FILS for freelancing, internship, linkedin and startup. Get to know about the important topics.

news.title: New Library Wing Opening
news.content: The university is opening a new modern library wing with state-of-the-art facilities including digital study pods, collaborative spaces, and an extensive collection of e-books.
news.author: Admin

news.title: Summer Internship Program
news.content: Applications are now open for the summer internship program with leading tech companies. Students can apply through the placement portal.
news.author: Placement Cell

news.title: Sports Week 2024
news.content: Annual sports week featuring various competitions and tournaments will be held from June 1-7. Registration is open for all students.
news.author: Sports Committee
